title: ChainDecayProcess
description:
A process involving non-resonant pair production of two (potentially different) BSM particles. Corresponds to a Higgs::predictions::PairProductionProcess. The process is defined by lists of decay modes `d1` and `d2` for the two produced particles. The rate is obtained as the sum over all possible combinations of `d1`, and `d2`.
 The example shows the process `pp/ee -> h1 h2, h1 -> bb, h2 -> tautau`.
